quest.name: Hematophagic Harassment
journal: Eadbert is testing adventurers by asking them to slay midge swarms.
To prove your ability and earn Eadbert's trust, slay six midge swarms.
As requested, you have slain six midge swarms and brought a measure of peace to the area in so doing. Bear word of your deeds to Eadbert in Hyrstmill.
You return safely to Hyrstmill and tell Eadbert of your deeds. Duly convinced of your worth, he declares that he has further need of your services.

dialogue.name: EADBERT
dialogue.text: It's my sworn duty to keep the peace in Hyrstmill an' protect her from them as would do her people harm. If ye mean to stay for a spell, ye'll have to prove ye can be trusted.

dialogue.name: EADBERT
dialogue.text: Ours ain't a large community, an' we've hardly any fightin' folk, so there's always a need for battle-savvy types, what with all the beasties lurkin' hereabouts.

dialogue.name: EADBERT
dialogue.text: As it happens, we've been sufferin' from an outbreak of midges of late. The buggers're drivin' our patrols to distraction. Now, if ye were to exterminate, say, half a dozen swarms, we'd know ye for a friend.

dialogue.name: EADBERT
dialogue.text: Ye've done us a kindness an' proven yerself capable besides. Take this with Hyrstmill's thanks.

dialogue.name: EADBERT
dialogue.text: Oh! Afore ye go, I've thought of somethin' else ye could do for us...
